Khojdeal is a deal discovery platform which enables you to get the best discount coupons while shopping online. We are committed to saving you some extra money by giving you cashback every time you shop through us!
This extension will show you the latest coupon codes and cashback deals on all major e-commerce stores like Flipkart, Ajio, Myntra, Nykaa, Mamaearth and more.
When you shop at any of these stores, we receive a commission for generating a sale for them. As a reward for using Khojdeal, we pass on this commission to you as cashback. This is real cash that can transferred to your Paytm wallet. Yes, its really that simple. But remember you can only avail this while you are logged in.
So go ahead and download the Khojdeal Chrome extension right now and start saving extra money on all your online orders!
